doc:
Beth Littleford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beth_Littleford 0 Elizabeth Anna Halcyon Littleford (born July 17, 1968) is an American actress, comedian, and television personality. She was one of the original correspondents on The Daily Show on Comedy Central from 1996 to 2000. Littleford has also appeared in the shows I'm in the Band and Dog with a Blog. Elizabeth_Anna_Halcyon_Littleford ( born July_17_,_1968 ) is an_American_actress , comedian , and television_personality . She was one of the_original_correspondents on The_Daily_Show on Comedy_Central from 1996 to 2000 . Littleford has_also_appeared in the_shows I 'm in the_Band_and_Dog with a_Blog .
